root.name: Medal of Honor: Underground
root.description: Medal of Honor Underground was the first direct sequel to the original Medal of Honor, which was released on the PlayStation in 1999. MoH: Underground game casted the player as Manon Batiste, a french Woman whom fights for the french resistance. She appears as a minor character is the original Medal of Honor game, as well as an NPC in Medal of Honor: Allied Assault and Medal of Honor: European Assault. The gameplay was more focused on Commando style, seek Destroy, and sabotage missions as a result of this character. The player would helm infiltrations of enemy compounds, rescue of War prisoners and sabotage Nazi weapons and equipment. At one point in the game, the player even goes in under the disguse of a Nazi officer. The stealth focused gameplay was broken up with the same great shooting mechanics from the original title (Medal of Honor Underground uses the same engine as the first game . The game sold very well, and is held as one of the best games in the franchise. It later became a member of the PlayStation Greatest Hits line-up.LevelsMission 1: Occupied!Level 1: Midnight Rendez-vousLevel 2: Amongst the DeadLevel 3: Without a TraceLevel 4: Tread CarefullyMission 2: Hunting the Desert FoxLevel 1: CasablancaLevel 2: Lighting the TorchLevel 3: Burning SandsLevel 4: Ally in the DesertMission 3: Undercover in CreteLevel 1: Getting the StoryLevel 2: What Lies at KnossosLevel 3: LabyrinthMission 4: Wewelsburg: Dark CamelotLevel 1: Ascent to the CastleLevel 2: ValhallaLevel 3: A Vicious CycleMission 5: Last Rites at Monte CassinoLevel 1: RoundaboutLevel 2: Prisoners of WarLevel 3: Mayhem in the MonasteryMission 6: A Mittlewerk SaboteurLevel 1: Plans for DestructionLevel 2: Sabotage!Level 3: Sidecar ShootoutMission 7: Liberation!Level 1: Final UprisingLevel 2: Street by StreetLevel 3: Operation MarketplaceLevel 4: The End of the Line
